thread.section_title: Choice Home Warranty Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Choice Home Warranty | www.choicehomewarranty.com
thread.title: Rita
thread.title_full: Choice Home Warranty reviewed by Rita

author: Rita
title: Rita
text: when trying to get service for my refridgerator.only 1 tech would apply and not available for 3-4 days... was given option I could search and get my own tech and PAY ALL upfront. and be reimbursed at your usual costs.... I was in no position to complaint, so did that got a tech next day, A part had to be ordered which took 2 weeks from manufacturer. At present Fridge working great, now waiting on reimburtment (maybe 30 days) hope in mail soon. other than this one time all other service calls (not many) have been very quick taken care of
